Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Mattias Ekholm?

Mattias Ekholm is 35 years old.

When was Mattias Ekholm born?

Mattias Ekholm was born on May 24, 1990.

Where was Mattias Ekholm born?

Mattias Ekholm was born in Borlange, Sweden.

How tall is Mattias Ekholm?

Mattias Ekholm is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

How much does Mattias Ekholm weigh?

Mattias Ekholm weighs 225 lbs (102 kg).

How many goals does Mattias Ekholm have?

Mattias Ekholm had 9 goals last season and 86 goals over his career.

How many points does Mattias Ekholm have?

Mattias Ekholm had 33 points last season and 360 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Mattias Ekholm won?

Mattias Ekholm has never won a Stanley Cup as a player.
